entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
